name: @celo/contractkit
description: Celo's ContractKit to interact with Celo network
author: Celo

scripts.lint-checks: yarn run lint && yarn run build alfajores
scripts.test: export TZ=UTC && jest --ci --silent --coverage --runInBand test/attestations.test.ts test/erc20-utils.test.ts test/google-storage-utils.test.ts test/start_geth.sh test/transaction-utils.test.ts
scripts.test:verbose: export TZ=UTC && jest --ci --verbose --runInBand  test/attestations.test.ts test/erc20-utils.test.ts test/google-storage-utils.test.ts test/start_geth.sh test/transaction-utils.test.ts
scripts.test-licenses: yarn licenses list --prod | grep '\(─ GPL\|─ (GPL-[1-9]\.[0-9]\+ OR GPL-[1-9]\.[0-9]\+)\)' && echo 'Found GPL license(s). Use 'yarn licenses list --prod' to look up the offending package' || echo 'No GPL licenses found'
